description: Change http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/e331287cdd1300878bfb9bbb3630889370e5fa72 did not update the exception handler correctly. That is, the exceptions were handled for RetrieveProperties (https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vim.py#L157)
title: VMware: exceptions for RetrievePropertiesEx incorrectly handled

comments.content: Change http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/e331287cdd1300878bfb9bbb3630889370e5fa72 did not update the exception handler correctly. That is, the exceptions were handled for RetrieveProperties (https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/vmwareapi/vim.py#L157)

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/43721
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/81a38aa8d49dcac7539d45e19cdccbe4237a7e9b
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 81a38aa8d49dcac7539d45e19cdccbe4237a7e9b
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Aug 26 08:00:50 2013 -0700

    VMware: handle exceptions from RetrievePropertiesEx correctly
    
    The commit below did not update the exception handling correctly:
    
      e331287cdd1300878bfb9bbb3630889370e5fa72
    
    The fault checker should be retrievepropertiesex_fault_checker instead of
    retrieveproperties_fault_checker.
    
    Fixes bug: 1216961
    Change-Id: I8be959fc2ef941f89347245a3077eba623824760
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
